item.title: About
item.description:
Education

Doctor of Philosophy in Mathematics, Seoul National University

  • Ph.D. in Mathematics, KAIST, 2017 Thesis: Secure Computation via Homomorphic Encryption
  • M.S. in Mathematics, POSTECH, 2011 Thesis: Efficient Inversion Algorithms and Its Application to ECDLP
  • B.S. in Mathematics, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), 2010

Career
